titles.title: Recognizing the week of March 15 through March 21, 2009, as "National Safe Place Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/5/2009--Introduced. Designates the week of March 15-21, 2009, as National Safe Place Week. Calls on people and groups to promote awareness of, and volunteer involvement in, the Safe Place program (which offers young people in early stages of crisis safe places where trained volunteers are available to counsel and advise them).
